entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High minus 2.

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending late this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 30 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
